title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide a correct explanation.

  • The stirring will not affect the maximum amount of KNO 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@38F1@ that will dissolve (which depends on the equilibrium between the solid and the dissolved ions), only the rate at which the solid dissolves.

The response provides a correct explanation.
